name: Preschool
description: Full time (5 days a week) or part time (2 or 3 days a week) programs to students from 2 to 6 years old. Hours are from 8am- 6pm. Our classroom ratios are 4:1 with experienced Lead Teachers and Associate Teachers. We provide all lunches and snacks daily.
fullDescription: Full time (5 days a week) or part time (2 or 3 days a week) programs to students from 2 to 6 years old. Hours are from 8am- 6pm. Our classroom ratios are 4:1 with experienced Lead Teachers and Associate Teachers. We provide all lunches and snacks daily.
whatTheyOffer: Full time (5 days a week) or part time (2 or 3 days a week) programs to students from 2 to 6 years old. Hours are from 8am- 6pm. Our classroom ratios are 4:1 with experienced Lead Teachers and Associate Teachers. We provide all lunches and snacks daily.
howToGetIt: Visit the enrollment section of their website for information on the steps to apply. You must complete an online application and provide a one time non refundable application fee of $100.
cost: This is a fee based service.
